summary: The lord of Seekers, for your travels.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#cc4125]Dragonborn is required
[/color]
[color=#6aa84f][size=5][b]Skyrim version recommended [/b][/size][/color][color=#6aa84f]to be 1.9.32.0 or higher
[/color][/b][/size]


[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/66/ec/66ec6bb0be36111878a103e929fd1f5b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/cd/51/cd51274aaae72aeb5eff9174c10be6c0.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=3][b][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/4a/7d/4a7ddd226a4b4c3aa3ab3a031016de6e.jpg[/img][/url]
[/b][/size]
[size=4][i]"There is a sea greater than any, and it can be found all around you. That sea, my dear lad, is knowledge"

[/i][/size][size=4][color=#6aa84f][b][About Oghma][/b][/color]

A sailor who lost himself many years ago on a dangerous quest, eventually he had found himself within the seas of Apocrypha in search of
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66001/?]the most important source of knowledge[/url][/size]

[size=4]Oghma can be [/size][size=4]found in the Retching Netch of Solsthiem[/size]

[size=4]Custom Pirate Armor
"infected" Right Arm
Custom Sword "The Depths"
Custom Spells
Utilizes in game DLC02 Textures
[/size][size=4]
[/size]
[color=#6aa84f][size=3][b][Recommended Mods][/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO[/url] by terzaerian
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73321?]Seeker and Lurker -Creature retex[/url] by Zeroking


[color=#6aa84f][size=3][b][Credit][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][b][size=2][color=#6aa84f]Unique Custom Textures with ENTHUSIASTIC thanks to[/color] [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/27469065-sartanmor/]SartanMor[/url][/size][/b][/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?]Vicn Creaure Pack[/url] by Vicn
[size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47477/?]Sexy Vanilla clothes and armor[/url] by Pfiffy[/b][/size][/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50459/?tab=files]Warmonger Armory[/url] by Batmanna (Armor Inspiration)

Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thank you all!

Changelog:
1.0 - first creation[/center]
